name: Hedgecoin
description: $HEDGE is a hedgehog-themed memecoin designed for traders who are tired of watching their gains disappear. The project focuses on celebrating capital protection and risk management rather than pure hype, using a simple idea: you donâ€™t have to be the smartest in the market, you just have to hedge. $HEDGE aims for a fair, transparent, community-driven project and will introduce web tools, education, and meme infrastructure that reinforce disciplined, survivorship-focused trading.
